FuncDef:
The reset radius-server accounting-start-packet command clears accounting-start packets cached in a queue.
The reset radius-server accounting-stop-packet command clears the statistics about cached Accounting Stop packets.
CLIs: reset radius-server { accounting-start-packet | accounting-stop-packet } { all | ip <ip-address> }

ParaDef.Info:
Clears the statistics about all Accounting Stop packets.
-

Specifies the IP address of a RADIUS server. The IP address is in the dotted decimal format.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
The statistics cannot be restored after being cleared.
The system can clear only the cached Accounting Stop packets.
